custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SegmentsExperiment.segmentsExperimentId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SegmentsExperiment INNER JOIN SegmentsExperimentRel ON SegmentsExperimentRel.segmentsExperimentId = SegmentsExperiment.segmentsExperimentId WHERE (SegmentsExperimentRel.segmentsExperienceId = ?) AND (SegmentsExperiment.plid = ?) [$STATUSES$]

SELECT SegmentsExperiment.* FROM SegmentsExperiment INNER JOIN SegmentsExperimentRel ON SegmentsExperimentRel.segmentsExperimentId = SegmentsExperiment.segmentsExperimentId WHERE (SegmentsExperimentRel.segmentsExperienceId = ?) AND (SegmentsExperiment.plid = ?) [$STATUSES$]
